exp1_bbn.physical_explanation: Chi-field is sourced by local mass concentrations. At BBN, homogeneous -> chi = 1.

exp2_gw.scope: Framework does not model tensor GW propagation
exp2_gw.warning: No numerical prediction computed. Scalar wave equation does not include tensor perturbations.
exp2_gw.theoretical_note: Chi-field couples to scalar field E only. GW propagation is outside modeled domain.

exp3_pulsars.scope: Framework does not model compact binary dynamics or GW backreaction
exp3_pulsars.warning: No LFM prediction computed. Assertion 'LFM = GR' is an axiom, not a derived result.
exp3_pulsars.theoretical_note: Chi-field formulation assumes static weak-field regime. Strong-field binary dynamics outside modeled domain.

exp5_bao.physical_explanation: LFM coherence scales (10-100 kpc) are << BAO scale (150 Mpc). No conflict.

correction_notice: 2026-01-05: EXP-2 and EXP-3 reclassified as OUT_OF_SCOPE. Previous PASS status was invalid (tautological tests).
note: EXP-1 and EXP-5 are toy models. EXP-2 and EXP-3 are outside modeled domain (no tensor GW, no binary dynamics).
